characters: A child on the right side of the image, a pedestrian on the left side of the image, a cyclist on the right side of the image, and a motorcyclist on the right side of the image.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of ghost probing behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly emerges from the right side of the image, darting into the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a pedestrian suddenly appears from the left side of the image, entering the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a cyclist emerges from the right side of the image, entering the driving lane from behind a parked vehicle. In the fourth sequence, a motorcyclist emerges from the right side of the image, entering the driving lane from behind a building.
actions: The child, pedestrian, cyclist, and motorcyclist all suddenly enter the driving lane from behind obstructions, creating immediate collision risks.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on the right side of the image, a building on the right side of the image, and roadside structures on the left side of the image.
